activities.description: Met with Mr. Robot to discuss eCorp activity. Looking for futher expansion into other technologies.
Met with Jane and had good conversation about buying more of services.
VP discussion on modernizing current infrastructure to future proof environment.
Second meeting with Mr. Robot. Mr. Robot is looking to elimanate the competition through aggressive expansion. He is looking for additional service to help with that.
Strategic meeting with Victor on current plans and future roadmap.
Met with Jane again to go over services proposal and moderization of current technologies.
